Name: cyclosporiasis
Definition: A coccidiosis that involves infection of the intestine with the parasitic protozoan Cyclospora cayetanensis

Name: cystoisosporiasis
Definition: A coccidiosis that involves infection of the epithelial cells of the small intestine with Cystoisospora belli

Name: sarcocystosis
Definition: A coccidiosis that involves infection of the intestine and muscles of humans and animals caused by an intracellular protozoan parasite of genus Sarcocystis. The symptoms include mild fever

Name: obsolete rheumatic chorea
Definition: A coccidiosis that involves infection of the intestine and muscles of humans and animals caused by an intracellular protozoan parasite of genus Sarcocystis. The symptoms include mild fever

Name: toxoplasmosis
Definition: A coccidiosis that has_material_basis_in protozoan Toxoplasma gondii. The parasite effects most genera of warm-blooded animals
